long_description: Built extra tough with 1,200-denier fabric and polyurethane coating, the DAKINE Heli-Pro 20L snow pack carries your load through all the use and abuse your backcountry powder-chasing adventures bring. Snug-fitting design hugs the load close to your body for better balance on uneven terrain and low-profile ease on chairlifts; compression straps further streamline the pack. Carry your snowboard in a stable and secure vertical configuration, or strap on alpine or backcountry skis diagonally; side holster secures your shovel handle or ice axe. Anatomically shaped shoulder straps and padded hipbelt help ensure all-day carrying comfort; sternum strap buckle doubles as a rescue whistle. Internal sleeve with tube exit port carries a water reservoir (sold separately) for easy hydration on the go. Non-padded laptop sleeve (fits most 15 in. laptops); zippered organizer pocket; fleece-lined goggles pocket. The DAKINE Heli-Pro 20L snow pack is made of 1,200-denier polyester fabric for durability; polyurethane coating provides water resistance.
short_description: Built extra tough with 1,200-denier fabric and polyurethane coating, the DAKINE Heli-Pro 20L snow pack carries your load through all the use and abuse your backcountry powder-chasing adventures bring.
